word: "But," you say, "the law cannot save anybody." No, we are free through Christ, living in obedience to the law, through the merits and righteousness and virtues of His character. And when we lay hold of Him by living faith, what shall we do? Keep the commandments of God and His law as the apple of your eye. These are the words of inspiration, "Keep them and live." You do not have anyone touch that part of your eye. You know how painful it is.
